tests.query: SELECT a,b,c,d FROM (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b, 3 AS c UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,4 ) js1 ANY INNER JOIN (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b,4 AS d UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,5) js2 USING (a) ORDER BY a,b,c,d ASC;
tests.name: 00098_l_union_all.sql

tests.query: SELECT a,b,c,d FROM (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b, 3 AS c UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,4 ) js1 ALL LEFT JOIN (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b,4 AS d UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,5) js2 USING (a) ORDER BY a,b,c,d ASC;
tests.name: 00098_l_union_all.sql

tests.query: SELECT a,b,c,d FROM (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b, 3 AS c UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,4 ) js1 ALL LEFT JOIN (SELECT 1 AS a,2 AS b,4 AS d UNION ALL SELECT 2,3,5) js2 USING a,b ORDER BY a,b,c,d ASC;
tests.name: 00098_l_union_all.sql
